dcterms:description: The DNS challenge corpus is used in experiments to mix clean speech and noise samples at random SNRs between -5dB and 5dB for training and validation, with a testing set consisting of clean speech mixed with noise at a fixed -5dB SNR.
dcterms:title: DNS challenge corpus
